title: News24.com | Eastern Cape lodge closes after German visitor tests positive for coronavirus
description: The lodge's owner had no idea the tourist had done precautionary tests for the coronavirus in KwaZulu-Natal before arriving in the Eastern Cape.
content:
Crawford Beach Lodge in the Eastern Cape shut its doors after a German tourist, who had visited the premises, tested positive for the coronavirus.
The lodge's owner, Mark Crawford, said he had no idea the tourist had done precautionary tests for the coronavi… [+1776 chars]
